InitializeStructure() - Static method in class scriptmanager.util.DNAShapeReference
A collection of 5-mers DNA strings with a list of constants that describe DNAshape assigned to each based on the Rohs Lab 2013 paper (http://rohslab.cmb.usc.edu/DNAshape/).

isGZipped(InputStream) - Static method in class scriptmanager.util.GZipUtilities
Checks if InputStream is gzipped by reading the next two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then resets the file marker to the original start position.
isGZipped(File) - Static method in class scriptmanager.util.GZipUtilities
Checks if File is gzipped by opening and reading the first two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then closing the file.
isSmaller(int) - Method in class scriptmanager.util.GenomeSizeReference
Check to make sure WINDOW size is smaller than every chromosome to prevent infinite loop.
isValid() - Method in class scriptmanager.util.CDTUtilities
 
isValidIUPACString(String) - Static method in class scriptmanager.util.FASTAUtilities
Perform regex validation ("[ATGCRYSWKMBDHVN]+") of motif string, capitalization INsensitive, to ensure that only IUPAC DNA nucleotide characters are used in the motif search.
